song.eTitle: Creator of the Stars of Night

verses.verse: Creator of the stars of night, Thy people's ever lasting light, O Christ, Thou Savior of us all, We pray Thee, hear us when we call.
At the great name of Jesus, now All knees must bend, all hearts must bow; And things celestial Thee shall own, And things terrestial, Lord alone.
To God the Father, God the Son, And God the Spirit, Three in one, Laud, honor, might, and glory be From age to age eternally. Amen.
